themeBuilder.title: Theme Builder
themeBuilder.description: With the Theme Builder you can customize headers, footers, and templates for different pages. (Found under Divi > Theme Builder)

globalPresets.title: Global Presets
globalPresets.description: Global Presets allow saving and applying style settings to various modules.

responsiveEditing.title: Responsive Editing
responsiveEditing.description: Allows editing the design for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

diviModules.title: Divi Modules
diviModules.description: Various pre-built modules for creating pages without programming.

layoutsLibrary.title: Layouts & Library
layoutsLibrary.description: Access to pre-built layouts and saving your own designs.

effectsAnimations.title: Effects & Animations
effectsAnimations.description: Add visual effects and animations for a more dynamic design.

customCss.title: Custom CSS & Advanced Settings
customCss.description: Access to advanced settings and the ability to add custom CSS code.

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again later.
